jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer - Full Stack
jobs.description: We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer to lead the development of our AI-powered platform. You will work with a talented team to build scalable, high-performance systems that serve millions of users. This role offers the opportunity to shape the technical direction of our product and mentor junior engineers.
requirements: 7+ years of software development experience
Expertise in Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, and at least one systems language
Strong background in distributed systems and cloud architecture (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Experience with microservices architecture and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment
BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent experience
nice_to_have: Experience with machine learning and AI technologies

jobs.title: ML/AI Engineer
jobs.description: Join our Machine Learning team to build and deploy cutting-edge AI models for real-time data analytics. You'll work on problems ranging from predictive modeling to natural language processing. Our team is collaborative and values innovation. We're looking for someone who can bridge the gap between research and production.
requirements: MS/PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related field (or equivalent industry experience)
Strong background in machine learning algorithms and deep learning
Proficiency in Python and experience with ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn)
Experience with data processing and big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop)
Understanding of MLOps and model deployment practices
Strong communication skills and ability to explain complex concepts
nice_to_have: Experience with NLP and computer vision
Familiarity with cloud ML services (SageMaker, Vertex AI)
Contributions to ML research papers or open source projects

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: We're looking for a DevOps Engineer to build and maintain our infrastructure. You'll work on CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure automation, and cloud architecture. This role is critical to our ability to deliver features rapidly while maintaining reliability and security.
requirements: 5+ years of DevOps or infrastructure engineering experience
Strong expertise with Kubernetes and container orchestration
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Deep knowledge of AWS services
Scripting skills in Python, Bash, or Go
Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions)
Understanding of networking, security, and database administration
nice_to_have: Experience with monitoring and logging tools (Prometheus, ELK)

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: Join our design-forward team to build beautiful, responsive web applications. You'll collaborate with designers and product managers to create delightful user experiences. We use modern web technologies and are committed to writing clean, maintainable code.
requirements: 3+ years of frontend development experience
Expert-level knowledge of React and modern JavaScript/TypeScript
Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and responsive design
Experience with state management solutions (Redux, MobX, Context API)
Familiarity with testing frameworks and practices
Knowledge of accessibility (WCAG) and web performance optimization
Experience with version control (Git) and collaborative development
nice_to_have: Experience with Next.js or other React frameworks
Experience with Figma or design tools

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: We're seeking an experienced Product Manager to drive the vision and strategy of our core product. You'll work across engineering, design, and marketing to define roadmaps and deliver value to our users. This role offers high visibility and the opportunity to make a significant impact on our product direction.
requirements: 5+ years of product management experience
Demonstrated success in shipping products or features
Strong data analysis and decision-making skills
Excellent communication and cross-functional collaboration abilities
Experience with technical products and understanding of engineering constraints
User research and customer empathy
Experience with product analytics tools
nice_to_have: Experience with marketplace or network effects products
